mainObjective: Navigate the abandoned mines to find the hidden entrance to the Dwarven Complex

plotPoints.title: Entering the Mines
plotPoints.description: The party arrives at the Entrance Tunnel (R1) and begins their exploration of the old mines.

plotPoints.title: Exploring the Abandoned Office
plotPoints.description: In the Abandoned Mining Office (R2), the party finds old maps and notes hinting at hidden passages.

plotPoints.title: Facing the Collapsed Passage
plotPoints.description: At the Collapsed Passage (R3), the party must navigate unstable terrain or find an alternative route.

plotPoints.title: Surviving the Gas Pocket Chamber
plotPoints.description: The Gas Pocket Chamber (R4) poses environmental hazards that the party must overcome.

plotPoints.title: Confronting the Fire Beetle Nest
plotPoints.description: The party encounters a nest of Fire Beetles in R5 and must deal with them to proceed.

plotPoints.title: Finding Useful Supplies
plotPoints.description: In the Equipment Storage (R6), the party finds useful gear and clues about the Ember Enclave.

plotPoints.title: Discovering the Hidden Passage
plotPoints.description: The party uncovers a Hidden Passage (R7) leading closer to their goal.

plotPoints.title: Crossing the Underground Stream
plotPoints.description: At the Underground Stream (R8), the party must find a way across or follow it to new areas.

plotPoints.title: Navigating the Ore Processing Room
plotPoints.description: In the Ore Processing Room (R9), the party discovers signs of recent activity.

plotPoints.title: Encounter with Ember Enclave Guards
plotPoints.description: At the Guard Post (R10), the party confronts members of the Ember Enclave.

plotPoints.title: Exploring the Crystal Cavern
plotPoints.description: In the Crystal Cavern (R11), the party discovers valuable crystals and hidden messages.

plotPoints.title: Traversing the Abandoned Shaft
plotPoints.description: The Abandoned Shaft (R12) presents challenges in navigation and safety.

plotPoints.title: Dealing with Waterlogged Tunnels
plotPoints.description: In the Waterlogged Tunnels (R13), the party must manage flooding and aquatic creatures.

plotPoints.title: Reaching the Hidden Entrance
plotPoints.description: The party reaches the Hidden Entrance to the Dwarven Complex (R14), completing their main objective in the mines.

sideQuests.title: Recover Lost Equipment
sideQuests.description: A miner asks the party to find his lost tools in the Equipment Storage (R6).

sideQuests.title: Collect Rare Crystals
sideQuests.description: An alchemist is interested in crystals from the Crystal Cavern (R11) and asks the party to retrieve some.

sideQuests.title: Investigate Strange Sounds
sideQuests.description: The party hears eerie sounds from the Waterlogged Tunnels (R13) and can choose to investigate.
